536860.name: The Revenge of Johnny Bonasera Demo
536860.description:
Hilarious adventure game designed in a TV cartoonish style.

This is the story of Johnny Bonasera, a kid that was beaten and humiliated by a punk gang.

Fueled by an insatiable desire for revenge, Johnny Bonasera promises revenge against each of the punks who humbled him. One by one. Unscrupulous. Mercilessly.

Features


  • 2D HD graphics in TV cartoon style.
  • An adventure full of hilarious dialogues and puzzles.
  • Outlandish characters to talk, interact, humble, beat, insult...
  • Texts in English, Spanish, German, Russian, Italian and French.
536860.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 法语, 德语
